title: Mastered by His Touch 4
description: The conclusion of the 4-part Mastered by His Touch series  Caden Storm is a man of mystery.  A billionaire who swept Kiri off her feet in a whirlwind of passion, he harbors a dark past that forever haunts him.  While Kiri wants nothing more than to trust this man who has so rocked her world, a series of flashbacks and some strange events are leading her to believe that Caden Storm is not the man he claims to be.  Born to a father who ignored him and a mother who didn't love him, the man who became Caden Storm lived a life of deceit, thievery, and debauchery.  Until one day when he realizes the one thing that's missing from his life...  Love.  Now Caden and Kiri's journeys are about to collide.  And at the center of it all is an evil that wants to keep them apart.  Is Caden deceiving Kiri? Can he ever be redeemed from his life of crime? Will greed and deception haunt them forever?  Everything comes together at a final confrontation in which the past and the present become one... and Kiri finds all the answers for which she has been looking.  Approximate length: 35,000 words (a novella)  Content Warning: This erotic romance contains graphic scenes of intimacy. For mature adults 18 years and older ONLY!  This is the fourth title in a series. Being the conclusion of the story, there is no cliffhanger ending.  Themes: Erotic romance, suspense, thriller, mystery, kink, BDSM, billionaire, alpha male.  If you liked Escaping Reality and Infinite Possibilities by Lisa Renee Jones, then you may enjoy this.
author: Skylar Cross
